document.full_text: coordinated explosions at three sites near government buildings in eastern china killed two people thursday and were set off by a man apparently angry about the illegal demolition of his home, state media reported.
document.title: two dead in blasts near china government buildings
lines_and_colors: coordinated explosions at three sites near government buildings in eastern china killed two people thursday and were set off by a man apparently angry about the illegal demolition of his home, state media reported.
